name: agentic-commons
description: Unified token usage stats for AI coding tools

scripts.build: tsc && npm run build -w @agentic-commons/shared && npm run build -w @agentic-commons/api && npm run build -w @agentic-commons/web
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build -w @agentic-commons/web && npx wrangler pages deploy apps/web/dist --project-name agentic-commons-web --branch main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:api && npm run deploy:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run build:cli && npm run typecheck -w @agentic-commons/shared && npm run typecheck -w @agentic-commons/api && npm run typecheck -w @agentic-commons/web
